items.title: MBA ASAP Corporate Finance Fundamentals
items.headline: The Concepts and Tools of Financial Analysis and Decision Making
objectives_summary: Corporate Finance is the tools and techniques of how companies make decisions about what projects to pursue, and how to value those projects. This course provides a framework for how financial professionals make decisions about how, when, and where to invest money.
You will be able to use these tools and calculations to value assets and make financial decisions relative to investing and allocating money and resources to the best projects.
Hone new skills online with expert faculty.

items.headline: Deep dive into Derivatives with the Bestselling CFA® prep course provider | With visual learning + Quizzes
objectives_summary: You will be introduced the the various types of derivatives in the markets: forwards, futures, swaps, options and credit derivatives.
You will be able to discuss the benefits and shortcomings of derivatives.
You will learn the difference between pricing and valuation for derivatives.
